About.firstP: Hi,I'm Enrqiue, a Full-Stack Developer with a deep passion for front-end technologies, I bring five years of dedicated experience in web development to the table. Originally graduating with a degree in Industrial Engineering, I embarked on a transformative journey to pursue my love for coding.
